data.eml:eml: Two new quill mite species (Prostigmata: Syringophilidae) parasitizing Australian birds

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Glowska, Eliza, Laniecka, Izabella (2013): Two new quill mite species (Prostigmata: Syringophilidae) parasitizing Australian birds. Zootaxa 3670 (3): 385-390, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.3.9
